about.title: About Dr. Jay Bhatt
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Homeopathy Specialist
about.journeyText: Dr. Jay Bhatt completed his BHMS from V.H. Dave Homeopathy College, Anand, Gujarat, and is currently pursuing MD in Medicine from NIH, Delhi. His dedication to homeopathic medicine and patient care has earned him recognition at national and state levels.
achievementsList: All India Rank 35 (AIR 35) in MD entrance examination
Rank 1 in Gujarat state for PG entrance exam
BHMS from V.H. Dave Homeopathy College, Anand
Currently pursuing MD in Medicine, NIH Delhi
Specialized in chronic diseases and child health
about.experienceText: With over 3 years of dedicated practice, Dr. Jay Bhatt has successfully treated patients with various conditions including chronic diseases, skin allergies, child health issues, and women's health concerns. His approach combines traditional homeopathic principles with modern understanding of health and wellness.
